newsitem.title: SYRIA: Syria tenders to buy 26,000 tonnes of sugar.
newsitem.headline: Syria tenders to buy 26,000 tonnes of sugar.

text.p: Syria's General Foreign Trade Organisation for Chemicals and Foodstuffs (GEZA) issued a tender to buy 13,000 tonnes of white sugar and 13,000 tonnes of raws, a GEZA spokesman said on Friday.
Both cargoes were for delivery in August, with July 15 set as the final date to receive price offers.
Results would be announced on July 16, the spokesman said.
GEZA announced the tender to replace one cancelled earlier this month.
